home.title: IFRS Converter
home.subtitle: Streamline your financial reporting with our IFRS conversion tool
home.description: Transform your financial reporting with our advanced IFRS conversion platform. Streamline compliance, enhance accuracy, and save valuable time.
home.globalComplianceDesc: Ensure your financial statements comply with international standards
home.accurateAnalysisDesc: Get precise insights into your financial data
home.dataSecurityDesc: Your financial information is protected with state-of-the-art security
home.step1Desc: Upload your financial statements in various formats
home.step2Desc: Our AI-powered system converts your statements to IFRS
home.step3Desc: Review the converted statements and download the results
home.readyToStart: Ready to start your IFRS conversion?

projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

instructions.title: Getting Started
instructions.step1: 1. Create a new project by entering a name and clicking 'Create New Project'
instructions.step2: 2. Once created, click 'Open Converter' to start the IFRS conversion process
instructions.step3: 3. Upload your financial statements and follow the guided steps
instructions.step4: 4. Review and download your IFRS-compliant statements
